title: Generalizing Across States

definitions.Q-Learning: Basic Q-Learning keeps a table of all q-values
definitions.Realistic Situations: In realistic situations, we cannot possibly learn about every single state!
definitions.Generalize: Instead, we want to generalize: Learn about some small number of training states from experience, Generalize that experience to new, similar situations, This is a fundamental idea in machine learning, and we'll see it over and over again

formulas: Q-Learning keeps a table of all q-values
summary: The slide discusses the concept of Q-Learning in machine learning, highlighting the limitations of learning about every single state in realistic situations. It suggests that instead of learning about all states, we should generalize from a small number of training states to new, similar situations, which is a fundamental idea in machine learning.
